sentences.sContent: ...spending her few waking hours in front of the TV.
sentences.sCn: …把她清醒的个把钟头花在电视机前。

sentences.sContent: ...there is almost no hard evidence for midlife crisis other than a few small pilot studies conducted decades ago...
...Only a few months later Leah opened her first yoga studio...
...but for the past few years scientists have wondered if the big cats were hanging on in remote parts of Sudan and Ethiopia...
...These products are only a few examples of the many ways space technology helps us in our everyday lives...
...I think it has been even more fun keeping the secret for me the past few weeks...
...The massive decline in sleep happened so slowly and quietly that few seemed to notice the trend...
...The manager told me that Jack Green's been very active around the shop the last few days...
...They help me out a few days a week...
...Can I get back to you on that in a few days...

phrases.pCn: 很少；只有几个；几乎没有
沉默寡言的人，少言寡语的
稀少；彼此相距很远；不常发生

trans.tranOther: not many or hardly any people or things
